issue.title: [GLib] Suppress sign-conversion warning on Clang
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1419](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1419). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Example:

```Java
.../arrow/buffer.h:296:41: warning:
      implicit conversion changes signedness: 'unsigned long' to 'int64_t'
      (aka 'long') [-Wsign-conversion]
  int64_t length() const { return size_ / sizeof(T); }
                           ~~~~~~ ~~~~~~^~~~~~~~~~~
```
